JSON Format: Measure-measure-mrp

Download Raw json 

{
  "resourceType" : "Measure",
  "id" : "measure-mrp",
  "meta" : {
    "versionId" : "1",
    "lastUpdated" : "2018-09-21T13:20:51.000-07:00"
  },
  "text" : {
    "status" : "generated",
    "div" : "<div xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"><p><b>Generated Narrative with Details</b></p><p><b>id</b>: measure-mrp</p><p><b>meta</b>: </p><p><b>url</b>: <a href=\"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/Measure/measure-mrp\">http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/Measure/measure-mrp</a></p><p><b>version</b>: 1.1.0</p><p><b>name</b>: DEQMMeasureMRPExample</p><p><b>status</b>: active</p><p><b>date</b>: Nov 18, 2019, 9:04:00 PM</p><p><b>jurisdiction</b>: United States of America <span style=\"background: LightGoldenRodYellow\">(Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America'})</span></p></div>"
  },
  "url" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/Measure/measure-mrp",
  "version" : "1.1.0",
  "name" : "DEQMMeasureMRPExample",
  "status" : "active",
  "date" : "2019-11-18T21:04:00-08:00",
  "jurisdiction" : [
    {
      "coding" : [
        {
          "system" : "urn:iso:std:iso:3166",
          "code" : "US",
          "display" : "United States of America"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
